header.note: The source node in most cases contains the sample message as written by the developer. If it looks like a dot-delimitted string such as "form.label.firstname", then the developer has not provided a default message.

trans-unit.source:
AwardWallet.com has 3 core features:
  1. AwardWallet is designed to help tracking different loyalty accounts for you and your family. We do it by logging into the different reward accounts and retrieving your balance on your behalf. We will retrieve or calculate expiration, elite level, etc. and show this information in a single, easy to understand report.
  2. AwardWallet will help you manage your travel plans via our " Trips" feature on the web and via our mobile apps.
  3. AwardWallet helps you redeeming your miles for first or business class international fares. Just submit a booking request and our team will work on finding the best itinerary for you.
trans-unit.target:
AwardWallet.com 具備 3 項主要功能：
  1. AwardWallet.com 網站協助您與家人追蹤不同忠誠計劃帳戶的哩數與積分。我們為您登入不同獎勵計劃帳戶並且擷取餘額訊息。我們將會擷取或計算有效期限、菁英等級等資訊，並且以彙整且簡單易懂的報告呈現。
  2. AwardWallet 將透過本公司網站或行動裝置應用程式的「 旅程」功能協助您管理旅遊行程。
  3. AwardWallet 協助您兌換哩程升等至頭等艙或商務艙。只需 提交預訂請求，我們的團隊便會為您尋找最佳路線。

trans-unit.source:
We always use industry-standard encryption technologies when transferring and receiving customer's data exchanged with our site. We have appropriate security measures in place in our physical facilities to protect against the loss, misuse or alteration of information that we have collected from you.

 

We offer and encourage our users to enable two-factor authentication on their accounts. This way even if someone steals your AwardWallet password or gets a hold of your computer they would still need a way to generate a one-time code to get into your profile.

 

All of your sensitive data is encrypted in our secure database. Whenever we transfer your passwords we use https secure protocol (heartbleed free). We also give you the ability to store your passwords locally on your computer in a cookie. However, there are advantages of storing your passwords in our database, for example we would be able to automatically check your balances for you and then send you a report with your balance changes. Thousands of people have trusted us with their account information, our service is very mature (we launched our website in 2004) and the website is hosted and founded in the United States of America.

 

We participate in a bounty bug hunt with Cobalt  https://cobalt.io/awardwallet where we pay hackers to find security issues with our service.

 

Finally for the techies out there here is more info:

  • Your AwardWallet passwords are hashed with bcrypt, cost:13, plus unique salt for each user.
  • For the passwords that users store locally on their computers we use Rijndael (similar to AES), 256 bit.
  • The "remember me" cookie is a sha 256 hash of certain user attributes
  • Loyalty account passwords are encrypted with 1024 RSA key.
  • If someone is trying to brute-force your account we will lock them out for a period of time after few invalid login attempts.
trans-unit.target:
我們採用符合業界標準的加密技術傳輸與接收客戶與本網站的資料交換。並且針對硬體設備採取適當的安全措施，以防止丟失、誤用或意外修改從您這裡收集到的資訊。

 

我們提供並鼓勵用戶在帳戶上 啟用 兩步驟驗證。如此一來，若您的 AwardWallet 密碼或電腦被盜用，則竊取者必須生成一次性密碼才能進入您的帳戶。

 

與您相關的敏感資訊皆經過加密，儲存在我們的安全化資料庫中。傳輸您的密碼時，必定使用 https 安全協議（完全免費）。您也可以利用 cookie 將密碼儲存在您的本機電腦中 。然而，將您的密碼儲存在我們的資料庫有些好處，例如我們可以自動檢查您的餘額，然後發給您一份餘額變化報告。已有成千上萬的客戶放心地將其帳戶資料交到我們手中，我們的服務非常成熟（我們的網站於 2004 年上線），網站的架設與主機管理都位於美國。

 

我們並參與 Cobalt  https://cobalt.io/awardwallet漏洞懸賞，透過獎金徵集黑客來協助找出我們服務的安全問題。

 

如果您是科技高手，以下是更詳盡的資訊：

  • 您的 AwardWallet 密碼通過 bcrypt 加密工具雜湊，cost ：13，加上每個用戶獨一無二的 salt 。
  • 用戶儲存在本機電腦上的密碼，則使用 256 位元的 Rijndael 加密標準（類似 AES 進階加密標準）。
  • 「記住我」暫存文件是具有某些用戶屬性的 sha 256 散列算法 。
  • 忠誠帳戶密碼以 1024 RSA 密鑰加密。
  • 如果有人試圖破解您的帳戶，經過幾次錯誤嘗試後，我們會將您的帳戶上鎖一段時間。

trans-unit.source:
After you login you need to go to " My Award Programs". On this page you can navigate to " Add a New Program" on the left navigation menu. Choose an award program from the list to be added to your profile. Please note that before adding a program you need to know your user name and password from the loyalty program's website that provides your balance. If you can’t login to the website that provides the balance (i.e for Marriott it would be http://www.marriott.com) AwardWallet would not be able to retrieve the balance either. After you add an award program to your profile it will show up under the " BALANCES" section. There you can either click the "update" button to automatically retrieve the balance for just one program, or you can click "Update All" button to automatically update all award programs on your profile. Please note that if your login info is correct you can also use our auto-login feature, so that AwardWallet.com would automatically log you into the provider's website (i.e. www.marriott.com). This way you can see any additional information about your account. The auto-login feature is available on most of the award programs that we support. For more details about the auto-login please see this tip:

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/28-auto-login/
trans-unit.target:
登錄後，您需要進入「 我的獎勵計劃」。進入該頁面後，從左側選單進入「 添加新計劃」。從清單中選取一個要添加到您的個人資料中的獎勵計劃。請注意，您必須擁有該忠誠計劃提供餘額查詢的網站的用戶名稱和密碼，才能添加該計劃。如果您無法登錄提供餘額查詢的網站（例如：萬豪國際集團的網站為 http://www.marriott.com），則 AwardWallet 將無法取得餘額資訊。當您在個人資料中添加一項獎勵計劃後， 它將在「 餘額」中顯示。您可以從這裡按下「更新」按鈕，以自動取得一項獎勵計劃餘額的資訊，或按下「全部更新」按鈕，以自動更新您的個人資料中所有獎勵計劃的餘額。請注意，如果您的登錄資料是正確的，您也可以使用我們的自動登入功能，這麼一來，AwardWallet.com 便能自動為您登入提供商網站（例如：www.marriott.com）。這樣，您就可以看到關於您的帳戶的任何附加資訊。自動登入功能適用於大多數我們支持的獎勵計劃。更多關於自動登錄的詳情，請見以下貼士：

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/28-auto-login/

trans-unit.source: No. AwardWallet can not transfer miles between programs, even if the award program allows transferring miles / points only the owner of the account can request such a transfer directly with the award program provider.
trans-unit.target: 否。AwardWallet.com 無法在不同的計劃之間轉移哩程。儘管有些獎勵計劃允許轉移哩程與積分，但只有帳戶的所有者可以直接向獎勵提供商提出轉移的要求。

trans-unit.source: After you added an award program to your profile you can follow the "edit" link, where you will be able to add a short comment to any given account (i.e. Mom’s account).
trans-unit.target: 當您在個人資料中添加了一項獎勵計劃後，您可以利用「編輯」連結，為帳戶添加一小段說明（例如：媽媽的帳戶）。

trans-unit.source: No. AwardWallet is not affiliated with any airlines, hotels or any other award programs and therefore does not have access to that information. It is your responsibility to know your award program numbers, ids, passwords etc.
trans-unit.target: 否。AwardWallet 不隸屬於任何航空公司、酒店或其他獎勵計劃，因此不能取得 這些資訊。知道您的獎勵計劃會員號碼、用戶名稱和密碼等是您的責任。

trans-unit.source: No.
trans-unit.target: 否。

trans-unit.source:
AwardWallet Free AwardWallet Plus
Price FREE $49.99/year
Display extra reward account properties    
Display historical account balance changes chart    
Display historical transactions for some of your loyalty accounts    
Allow exporting award balances into Excel or PDF formats    
Update accounts in parallel (up to 5X faster)    
Support AwardWallet development efforts    
Number of times users can update a single account per 24 hours Twice Unlimited
Display expiration date of your miles or points Up to 3 expirations Unlimited
Automatically track reward balances    
Track rewards for your family members    
Automatically track travel plans    
Allow sharing travel plans or reward balances    
Notify when balances expire via email and (optionally) push notifications on your phone
(frequency: 90, 60, 30, and 7 days before expiration)		    
Access all of your data on a mobile device    
Set up two-factor authentication on your account    
Credit card spend analytics of day-to-day transactions to optimize points earned with each merchant
trans-unit.target:
AwardWallet 免費版 AwardWallet Plus
自動追蹤獎勵餘額    
為家人追蹤獎勵    
自動追蹤旅行計劃    
允許分享旅行計劃或獎勵餘額    
餘額到期時透過電子郵件與（可選）電話推送通知
（頻率：到期前 90、60、30 與 7 天）		    
從行動裝置取得所有資料    
在您的帳戶上 設置兩步驟驗證    
顯示額外的獎勵帳戶特性    
顯示帳戶餘額變化記錄圖    
顯示部分忠誠帳戶交易記錄    
允許將獎勵餘額以 Excel 或 PDF 格式匯出    
同步更新多個帳戶（速度加快 5X ）    
顯示哩程或積分到期日期 3 個到期日期 無限
支持 AwardWallet 的開發工作    
價格 免費 1 年 $49.99

trans-unit.source: Yes. None of your data will be deleted you will just be downgraded with an option to upgrade.
trans-unit.target: 是。不會刪除您的任何資料，您只會被降級，並且有升級選項。

trans-unit.source:
1. Indicates that the balance has changed in the last 24 hours
2. Checkbox to select this account for further actions
3. Shows more details about the account
4. Auto-login is disabled for this account
5. Provider alliance icon
6. Alliance elite level progress
7. Username used to login to this account
8. Account number
9. Indicates that the password for this account is stored locally in the browser
10. Current elite level in the program
11. Elite level progress
12. Account balance
13. Indicates that background updating is turned off for technical reasons
14. Shows it is the custom entry and the balance is not updated automatically
15. Last balance change value
16. Shows if the last balance change was positive or negative
17. Progress toward your set goal
18. Balance expiration date
19. Shows that the balance expiration date was calculated
trans-unit.target:
1.表示在過去 24 小時內有餘額變更
2.勾選本帳戶以執行更多動作
3.表示有關該帳戶的更多詳情
4.已取消本帳戶自動登入
5. 供應商聯盟圖標
6.聯盟菁英等級進展
7.用於登入這個帳戶的用戶名稱
8.帳戶號碼
9.表示這個帳戶的密碼儲存在本機瀏覽器
10.目前在計劃中的菁英等級
11.菁英等級進度
12.帳戶餘額

15.最後餘額變動值
16.表示最後餘額的變化是正還是負
17.邁向您所設定的目標的進度
18.餘額到期日期
19.表示餘額到期日為計算值

trans-unit.source:
If you invite users and they join AwardWallet you get free 6-month upgrades for every 5 people who join, however, there is more to it. If any of the people you invite pay us for AwardWallet Plus, you will get bonus points in proportion to their contribution. If the people you invited don't pay us for upgrades you don't get any points. When you reach certain thresholds, we will convert those points into miles of your choice and deposit those miles or points into your loyalty account. For more details please review this tip:

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/21-awardwallet-referrals/
trans-unit.target:
如果您邀請用戶，而且他們加入 AwardWallet，每 5 人加入您將得到 6 個月免費升級，不僅如此，還有其他更多好處。如果 您邀請的任何人付費升級至 AwardWallet Plus，您可以依據他們支付的費用，按比例得到紅利積分。如果您邀請的人未付費，您則不會得到積分。當您達到 一定的積分門檻後，我們會將這些積分轉換成您所選擇的哩程，並將這些積分存放到您的忠誠帳戶。更多詳情請見這則貼士：

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/21-awardwallet-referrals/

trans-unit.source:
AwardWallet Business interface is designed for our business clients, while AwardWallet.com is designed for individual members to track personal programs for themselves and for their family members. The business interface is designed to:
  1. Manage reward booking requests for your users (additional setup required to enable this feature).
  2. Track corporate loyalty programs such as Alaska Airlines (EasyBiz) or KLM BlueBiz programs.
  3. Have many linked users under your profile. While regular Awardwallet.com interface is not designed to support hundreds or thousands of linked accounts business interface is designed just for that. You can link a business account with travelers who use regular AwardWallet interface and they can choose what to share with your business account. For example, travelers may choose to only share their reward account numbers or they may let the business to completely administer and monitor their reward accounts.
  4. The business interface lets you track individual users travel plans.
  5. The business interface comes with an API that allows you to grab account information programmatically.
trans-unit.target:
AwardWallet Business 企業界面是專為我們的企業客戶設計的，而 AwardWallet.com 是為個人會員設計的，專為用戶及其家庭成員追踪個人計劃。您可以透過 https://business.AwardWallet.com界面：
  1. 管理您的用戶的獎勵預訂請求（必須經過另外的設定才能啟動這項功能）。
  2. 追蹤阿拉斯加航空 (EasyBiz) 或荷蘭航空 BlueBiz 等公司忠誠計劃。
  3. 您可以在您的個人檔案中與其他用戶連線。普通 Awardwallet.com 界面的設計無法支持數百或數千個連線帳戶，而企業界面正是為該目的而設計。您可以用企業界面與使用普通 AwardWallet 界面的旅客連線，他們可以選擇與您的企業帳戶共享哪些資訊。 例如旅客可以選擇只分享他們的獎勵帳號或者他們可以讓企業 完全管理和監控他們的獎勵帳戶。
  4. 企業界面有獨特的呈現方式，帳戶按照忠誠計劃分組，所以如果在您的個人資料有 100 位擁有希爾頓帳戶的旅客，他們所有的帳戶將被集合成一個希爾頓帳戶條目，並用一個圓餅圖顯示擁有的積分數。
  5. 企業界面可以讓您追蹤個別用戶的旅行計劃。
  6. 您可以安排將您的帳戶資訊從企業界面以 csv 格式匯出到您的公司網絡中，以進行其他類型的報告。

trans-unit.source:
This feature is only available to business accounts ( https://business.AwardWallet.com). If you have an AwardWallet Business account, you can schedule your accounts to be exported as described in our API documentation:

https://awardwallet.com/api/account
trans-unit.target:
僅企業帳戶 ( https://business.AwardWallet.com)擁有該功能。若您擁有 AwardWallet 企業用戶帳戶，您可以排定依據 API 文件所述方式匯出帳戶：

https://awardwallet.com/api/account

trans-unit.source:
AwardWallet OneCard is a credit card sized plastic card with magnetic strip (which enables you to check in for your flights at airport kiosks ). The card will have your personal account numbers and program phone numbers printed on the front and back sides. The card can contain up to 30 different loyalty program accounts listed. We have two types of cards: gold and silver. Those AwardWallet members who have over 1 million miles and points will get a gold card and those who have fewer than 1 million miles and points will get a silver card. The cards will be shipped internationally as well as within United States via regular United States Postal Service.


OneCard has a flat cost of $10 with free shipping anywhere in the world.  More details can be found here.
trans-unit.target:
AwardWallet 一卡通是一張信用卡大小帶有磁條的塑膠卡片（可在機場的自助服務終端上辦理航班登機）。該卡的正面和背面印有您的個人帳戶號碼和獎勵計劃電話號碼。該卡可以包含多達 30 個我們清單中的忠誠計劃帳戶。卡片分成金卡和銀卡兩種。擁有超過 100 萬哩和積分的 AwardWallet 會員將獲得金卡，擁有不到 100 萬哩和積分的會員將獲得銀卡。該卡將通過正規的美國郵政服務寄往國外及美國國內。

OneCard 費用為 $10，並免費寄送至世界各地。 請見 這裡獲得更多詳情。

trans-unit.source: No, AwardWallet OneCard does not store any of your passwords so if you lose your card you only lose your account numbers, not the passwords.
trans-unit.target: 否，AwardWallet OneCard 一卡通不會儲存您的任何密碼，因此，如您的卡片丟失了，您只失去了您的帳號，而不是密碼。

trans-unit.source: No. AwardWallet is completely independent of any of the hotels, airlines or credit cards referenced herein and of any of the loyalty programs tracked or monitored using our services.
trans-unit.target: 否。AwardWallet 完全獨立於這裡提及的任何酒店、航空公司或信用卡以及我們所追踪或監視的忠誠計劃。

trans-unit.source:
Yes! Please read the following press relase on this subject:

http://news.aa.com/news/news-details/2013/American-Airlines-and-AwardWallet-Offer-New-Reward-Tracking-Technology-for-AAdvantage-Members/default.aspx
trans-unit.target:
是！請閱讀以下關於這一主題的新聞發佈：

http://news.aa.com/press-releases/press-release-details/2013/American-Airlines-and-AwardWallet-Offer-New-Reward-Tracking-Technology-for-AAdvantage-Members/default.aspx

trans-unit.source:
A business account can be registered from scratch via:

https://business.awardwallet.com/?Register=1

Or if you have a personal account on AwardWallet you can create a business account linked to your personal account so that you would be able to use the same credentials to login to a business account and to your personal account. To do that please follow this link:

https://awardwallet.com/user/create-business-account
trans-unit.target:
可以從頭開始通過：

https://business.awardwallet.com/?Register=1 註冊企業帳戶

或者，如果您有一個 AwardWallet 個人帳戶，您可以創建一個連線到您的個人帳戶的企業帳戶，這樣您就能夠使用相同的憑證登錄企業帳戶和您的個人帳戶。請按此連結進行：

https://awardwallet.com/user/create-business-account

trans-unit.source: The price is $2.50 per month per managed member.
trans-unit.target: 管理每名會員的費用為每月 $2.50 。
trans-unit.note: The amounts should be in US$, not EUR

trans-unit.source: Sort of. First of all with the free version you can click the "Edit" button by any program to see its expiration (even if it is hidden in the list view). So it is literally one click away. Second, you can ungroup your programs ("Views" button, top right corner -> "Ungroup Accounts (flat list)") and then sort your programs by the expiration, by the program name, or by the balance in either direction (Ascending or Descending). Since we always show the first 3 expirations by reordering the programs you control which expirations are visible.
trans-unit.target: 某種程度而言是的。首先，您可以在所有的免費版本中，按下「編輯」查看任何計劃的到期日（即使它隱藏在清單視圖中）。所以只要按一下即可。其次，您可以取消您的計劃分組（從左側選單條），然後按照到期日、計劃名稱或餘額對您的計劃加以分類，並可以選擇升序或降序排列。因為我們總是顯示前 3 個到期日，因此在對忠誠計劃重新排序後，您就可以決定可以看見哪些到期日。

trans-unit.source:
First of all you have to have admin rights on your computer in order to install this extension, in other words you should be able to install other programs on your compuer. If you have gone through installing the extension but AwardWallet keeps telling you that the extension is not installed you should verify two things:
  1. Make sure that the extension is actually enabled. Here are couple of screenshots that can help you do that:


  2. Make sure you fully restarted Internet Explorer after enabeling the extension. In most cases closing all the browser windows, but in some cases a computer reboot is required. 

If these steps do not work you can try uninstalling the extension and installing it again from scratch. Here is how you uninstall the extension:
trans-unit.target:
首先，您必須擁有您的電腦的管理員權限，才可以安裝這項擴展程式，換句話說，您必須可以在您的電腦上安裝其他程式。如果您已經安裝了該擴展程式，但 AwardWallet 不斷告訴您未安裝該擴展程式，那麼您應該要確認以下兩點：
  1. 檢查並確認該擴展程式已啟動。這裡有幾張螢幕截圖可以幫助您做到這一點：


  2. 啟用該擴展程式後，確定您完全重新啟動 IE 瀏覽器。在大多數情況下，關閉所有的瀏覽視窗即可，但在某些情況下需要重新啟動電腦。 
如果這些步驟不起作用，您可以嘗試解安裝該擴展程式，並從頭開始重新安裝。擴展程式解安裝說明：

trans-unit.source:
• Click the little arrow next to the "Other Calendars" section and choose "Add by URL":

  • Copy and paste your personal iCal link that you got by clicking the Calendar auto-import button:


  • If your Google Calendar is not getting updated with new travel plans, please add the following string to the end of the url: "?nocache" without the quotes, per this thread.
trans-unit.target:
• 按下「其他日曆」旁邊的小箭頭並選擇「以網址新增」：

  • 複製並貼上您經由按下 日曆自動匯入按鍵所得到的 iCal 連結：


  • 若您的谷歌日曆未隨新旅行計劃更新，請在網至末尾加入「?nocache」（不含引號），如 這個執行緒。

trans-unit.source:
• Click File -> New Calendar Subscription:

  • Copy and paste your personal iCal link that you got by clicking the  Calendar auto-import button:

  • Configure the settings as you see fit:
trans-unit.target:
• 按下檔案 -> 新日曆訂閱：

  • 複製並貼上您經由按下 日曆自動匯入按鍵所得到的 iCal 連結：

  • 配置設置 ：

trans-unit.source:
• Open Microsoft Outlook and switch to your Calendar:

  • In the top menu bar click "Open Calendar" -> "From Internet":

  • Copy and paste your personal iCal link that you got by clicking the  Calendar auto-import button:
trans-unit.target:
• 打開微軟 Outlook 並切換至您的日曆：

  • 從最頂端的選單條按下「開啟日曆」 -> 「從網路」：

  • 複製並貼上您經由按下 日曆自動匯入按鍵所得到的 iCal 連結：

trans-unit.source:
Here is how this works:
  • You submit a new reward booking request that goes into our booking queue.
  • Someone from the booking team that works with AwardWallet will reach out and work with you.
  • The cost may vary from $150 to $199 per booked person.
It's worth mentioning that there are two teams involved: the team that does the actual bookings and AwardWallet's tech support. The AwardWallet team only provides you with a technical platform – a way to manage your booking requests and to securely share your reward information with your agent. The booking team will actually do all the groundwork: they search for availability, they run different options by you (so they will communicate with you back and forth before any tickets are booked), they find the most optimal and least expensive routes, they do the actual bookings, and they handle the payments. They are the experts at doing reward bookings, they have done tens of thousands of bookings for their clients and they are very creative in finding availability. All of the communication about a booking request is done via AwardWallet website where you can manage your requests and communicate with your booking agent about your requests. So if you have a question related to a booking request please don’t send it to AwardWallet support as we would not be able to help you, instead, you need to login to your account and respond to your existing booking request or create a new booking request:

https://awardwallet.com/awardBooking/add

For more details please review this tip:

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/23-award-booking-service/
trans-unit.target:
運作方式如下：
  • 您 提出一項新的獎勵預訂請求，該請求進入我們的預訂列。
  • 預訂團隊中一名以 AwardWallet 作業的人員將會與您聯繫。
  • 每個人的預訂費用從 $150 至 $199 不等。
值得一提的是，一共有兩個團隊負責作業：實際負責預訂的團隊與 AwardWallet 的技術支援。AwardWallet 團隊僅提供技術平台 – 一種管理您的預訂請求，並與您的代理人安全地共享您的獎勵資訊的方法。預訂團隊則進行所有的基礎作業：他們查找是否有空位、考慮您的安排選項與要求（在訂票前會和您往覆進行多次溝通）、負責找到最合適且最低價的路徑，並實際進行預訂並處理付款事宜。他們是獎勵訂票的專家，已經為客戶訂過數以萬計的機票，並且在找位方面創意絕佳。所有關於預訂請求的通信均通過 AwardWallet 網站進行，您可以從網站上管理您的請求，並就您的要求與您的預訂代理人進行溝通。所以，如果您有與訂票請求相關的問題，請不要將其發送給 AwardWallet 的支援部門，我們無法為您提供協助。您需要登入您的帳戶 以回覆現有的訂票請求， 或者建立一則新的預訂請求：

https://awardwallet.com/awardBooking/add

更多詳情請見這則貼士：

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/23-award-booking-service/

trans-unit.source:
Yes, you can enable two-factor authentication in your profile making your AwardWallet profile much more secure. At a high level it means you will use your phone to generate a one-time code in addition to your username and password to login to AwardWallet.  If you don’t know what two-factor authentication is you can read the following Wiki article or just Google it. 

Setting up two-factor authentication is very easy; first you need to download a Google Authenticator app, for your Android, iOS or Windows Phone device. Then you need to click “ Setup” under the Two-factor Authentication heading in your AwardWallet profile. After that you will see a special QR code that needs to be scanned by the Google Authenticator app to set it up:
 


Then you enter the code generated by the app into AwardWallet and you are done. Fore more details please check out this tip:

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/26-two-factor-authentication/
trans-unit.target:
是。您可以啟動個人檔案中的兩步驟驗證，以增加 AwardWallet 帳戶的安全性。較高的安全等級，意味著除了用戶名稱與密碼之外，您還必須透過手機產生一個一次性密碼，才能登入 AwardWallet。 如果您不瞭解兩步驟驗證的意思，可以閱讀以下 維基頁面或透過 Google 查詢。 

兩步驟驗證的設定非常簡便；首先您必須先在您的 Android、 iOS或 Windows Phone裝置下載 Google Authenticator 應用程式。然後按下 AwardWallet 我的帳戶兩步驟驗證標題旁邊的「 設置」。接下來您會看見一個 QR 條碼，以 Google Authenticator 應用程式掃描該條碼以進行設定：
 


接下來只要將該應用程式自動產生的代碼輸入 AwardWallet 中，即完成設置。更多詳情請見這則貼士：

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/26-two-factor-authentication/

trans-unit.source:
In the web interface, once your accounts page is finished loading, just start typing the account name you wish to see, and it will show up. See the following tip for more details:

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/1-filter-accounts/
trans-unit.target:
In the web interface, once your accounts page is finished loading, just start typing the account name you wish to see, and it will show up.See the following tip for more details:

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/1-filter-accounts/

trans-unit.source: No. AwardWallet cannot sign you up for an award program, nor can we add miles or points to your loyalty accounts. AwardWallet can help you keep track of your award program balances by logging in, on your behalf, to websites that have your balance information. We can not add miles to your program, only the owner of the award program can do that. You would need to contact the airline that you used for travel and request that they add the miles to your account. Then, use AwardWallet to track your balances. AwardWallet is especially useful if you are participating in multiple award programs with different airlines, hotels, credit cards, etc.
trans-unit.target: 否。 AwardWallet.com 不能為您註冊獎勵計劃，也不能在您的獎勵計劃中添加哩程或積分。AwardWallet.com 可以您的名義，登入擁有您的餘額資訊的網站，以幫助您追蹤獎勵計劃餘額。我們不能在您的獎勵計劃中添加哩程，只有獎勵計劃的所有者才可以那樣做。您必須與您所搭乘的航空公司聯繫，要求他們將哩程添加至您的忠誠計劃帳戶中。接下來，再使用 AwardWallet.com 追踪您的餘額。若您參加了多家航空公司或酒店提供的獎勵計劃，AwardWallet.com 便特別有用。

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, at the moment AwardWallet does not offer phone support, so there is no number you can call to talk to us, but you can submit any questions you have via our Contact Us page, and one of our support representatives will be in touch. We typically answer support requests within 1 business day.
trans-unit.target: 很抱歉，AwardWallet 目前尚未提供電話支援服務，所以沒有可以與我們通話的電話號碼，不過您可以透過 與我們聯繫頁面發送任何疑問，我們的支援代表將與您聯繫。 我們通常會在 1 個工作日內予您回覆。

trans-unit.source: No. AwardWallet is designed to track your award program balances by logging on, on your behalf, to websites that have your balance information. We are not affiliated with those websites (i.e. hilton.com, jetblue.com, etc.) in any way, so you need to resolve any account related issues directly with the provider of the award program. For example, if you do not know how to login to the hilton.com website to check your Hilton Honors balance you need to go to hilton.com​​​​​​​ and resolve this problem directly with them before you will be able to use AwardWallet.
trans-unit.target: 否。AwardWallet.com 以您的名義登入擁有您的餘額資訊的網站，以追蹤您的獎勵計劃餘額。我們不以任何方式隸屬這些網站（即 www.delta.com、 united.com等）， 因此任何與獎勵計劃帳戶相關的問題，都必須與計劃提供者直接聯繫處理。例如，如果您不知道如何登入 美國聯合航空公司網站以檢查前程萬里（Mileage Plus）的哩程餘額，在您使用 AwardWallet.com 之前，您必須聯繫 www.united.com 並直接請他們解決此問題。

trans-unit.source:
1 The number one reason for such error is invalid credentials. Before AwardWallet can retrieve your balance information you need to make sure that you can login to the provider’s website and see your balance. Here is how you can verify that you are entering valid credentials:
a
Go to AwardWallet and click the "Edit" link by the program in question.
b
Then click on "Reveal password" right underneath your password field.
c
At this point you will be prompted for your master AwardWallet password. Type it in and click Reveal.  After that you should be seeing both your user name and password in clear text.
d
Copy your user name and password and then paste  (don't simply re-type)  them into the login input boxes on the provider website in question.
2 If the provider's website is asking you some questions about your profile after you login, until you answer those questions, AwardWallet will not be able to check your balance.
3 If you chose to save your passwords locally, it is possible that you either deleted cookies or changed computers.
4 It is also possible that the provider’s website has changed and AwardWallet is not aware of it. If none of the above is true, please send a note to us and we will do our best to fix the issue.
trans-unit.target:
1.這種錯誤通常的原因是憑證無效。您必須確保您可以登入提供商的網站並能夠看到您的餘額，AwardWallet 才可能擷取您的餘額資料。這裡是如何驗證輸入的憑證是否有效的說明：
a)  前往 AwardWallet 並從目前處理的計劃按下「編輯」連結。
b) 按下密碼欄下方的「顯示密碼」。
c)  此時系統將提示您輸入主 AwardWallet 密碼。鍵入密碼，然後按下顯示。 之後，您會看到明文顯示的用戶名稱和密碼。
d) 複製您的用戶名稱和密碼，然後將其貼到（不要重新輸入）提供商網站的登入輸入框中。  

2.登入後，如果提供商的網站問您一些關於您的個人身份的問題，您必須先回答這些問題，AwardWallet 才可能檢查您的餘額資料。

3.如果您之前選擇了以本機保存密碼，那麼有可能您刪除了 cookies 或者更換了電腦。

4.也有可能提供商的網站經過修改，但 AwardWallet 尚未察覺。如果不是以上任一情形，請 發訊息通知我們，我們會盡最大的努力來解決這個問題。

trans-unit.source: I am new to AwardWallet.com, what are the benefits of using this service?
trans-unit.target: 我剛剛接觸 AwardWallet.com，使用這個網站有什麼好處？

trans-unit.source: How does AwardWallet ensure that my account information is secure?
trans-unit.target: AwardWallet.com 如何保證我帳戶資訊的安全？

trans-unit.source: How can I update the award miles in my account?
trans-unit.target: 我該如何更新我的帳戶中的獎勵哩程？

trans-unit.source: I have miles / points on different award programs, I would like to consolidate these miles / points into one award program, can AwardWallet help?
trans-unit.target: 我在不同的獎勵計劃中擁有哩程/積分，我想把這些哩程/積分合併到一個獎勵計劃中，AwardWallet.com 是否可以提供協助？

trans-unit.source: I am using AwardWallet.com to track award program balances for all of my family members with just one profile on your site, and have hard time distinguishing between accounts. How should I do this?
trans-unit.target: 我使用 AwardWallet.com 來追踪所有家庭成員的獎勵計劃餘額，而在你們的網站上卻只有一個個人檔案，因此我很難在帳戶之間進行區分。我應該怎樣解決這個問題？

trans-unit.source: I need to find out my membership number / ID for a particular award program, or change any of my personal preferences (such as my address, email, etc.) on any award programs, can AwardWallet help with that?
trans-unit.target: 我需要找出一個特定獎勵計劃的會員號碼/用戶名稱，或更改其中一個獎勵計劃的個人偏好設定（如我的地址、電子郵件等），AwardWallet 是否能對此提供幫助？

trans-unit.source: Does AwardWallet allow me to sell or buy miles?
trans-unit.target: AwardWallet 允許我出售或者購買哩程嗎？

trans-unit.source: What is the difference between a Free account and account that was upgraded to AwardWallet Plus?
trans-unit.target: 免費帳戶和升級到 AwardWallet Plus 的帳戶之間有什麼不同？

trans-unit.source: If I don't renew my account will I just be downgraded from AwardWallet Plus?
trans-unit.target: 如果我不繼續升級，我只會從 AwardWallet Plus 被降級嗎？

trans-unit.source: How do I know if my balance recently changed and what do all the different symbols mean in the list of my accounts?
trans-unit.target: 我如何知道我的餘額最近是否出現變化，我的帳戶清單中各個符號的涵義是什麼？

trans-unit.source: What is AwardWallet's referral bonus system all about? How does it work?
trans-unit.target: AwardWallet 的推薦紅利制度是怎麼一回事呢？它是如何運作的？

trans-unit.source: What is the difference between AwardWallet personal interface and AwardWallet Business interface ( https://business.AwardWallet.com) ?
trans-unit.target: AwardWallet 個人界面和企業界面 ( https://business.AwardWallet.com/) 有何不同？

trans-unit.source: How do I schedule a download of my AwardWallet data?
trans-unit.target: 我如何排定下載我的 AwardWallet 資料的時間？

trans-unit.source: What is AwardWallet OneCard?
trans-unit.target: 什麼是 AwardWallet 一卡通？

trans-unit.source: If I lose the OneCard, does it mean all of my logon account are lost also?
trans-unit.target: 如果我丟失了一卡通，是否意味著我登錄的所有帳戶也都丟失了？

trans-unit.source: Is AwardWallet owned by any of the hotels, airlines or credit card companies featured in your program?
trans-unit.target: AwardWallet 是否隸屬任何你們支持的計劃的酒店、航空公司或信用卡公司？

trans-unit.source: I have an American Airlines account; will AwardWallet be able to help me track my American Airlines information?
trans-unit.target: 我有一個美國航空公司的帳戶；AwardWallet 能夠幫助我追踪我在美國航空公司的資訊嗎？

trans-unit.source: How do I register a Business account for my company?
trans-unit.target: 我如何為我的公司註冊一個企業帳戶？

trans-unit.source: How much does the AwardWallet business account cost?
trans-unit.target: AwardWallet 企業帳戶的費用是多少？

trans-unit.source: The free interface only shows 3 expirations. I would like to choose which 3 expirations i can see. Is that possible?
trans-unit.target: 免費界面只會顯示 3 個到期日。我希望可以選擇哪 3 個到期日。這可能嗎？

trans-unit.source: I am having trouble installing AwardWallet extension under Internet Explorer. What should I do to get it fixed?
trans-unit.target: 我在 Internet Explorer 中安裝 AwardWallet 擴展程式時發生困難。我應該怎麼做？

trans-unit.source: How do I auto-import AwardWallet travel plans into my Google calendar?
trans-unit.target: 我如何把 AwardWallet 旅行計劃自動導入我的 Google 日曆？

trans-unit.source: How do I auto-import AwardWallet travel plans into my Mac Calendar app?
trans-unit.target: 我如何把 AwardWallet 旅行計劃自動導入我的 Mac 日曆應用程式？

trans-unit.source: How do I auto-import AwardWallet travel plans into my Microsoft Outlook calendar?
trans-unit.target: 我如何把 AwardWallet 旅行計劃自動導入我的 Microsoft Outlook 日曆？

trans-unit.source: How does AwardWallet booking service work?
trans-unit.target: AwardWallet 的訂票服務如何運作？

trans-unit.source: Does AwardWallet allow me to use two-factor authentication with my account?
trans-unit.target: AwardWallet 是否允許我設置帳戶兩步驟驗證？

trans-unit.source: I have too many accounts in my profile, how can I quickly find specific accounts?
trans-unit.target: I have too many accounts in my profile, how can I quickly find specific accounts?

trans-unit.source: I just took a trip and need to apply for a frequent flyer program or add my new miles to a program that I am already participating in, can AwardWallet help?
trans-unit.target: 我剛剛完成一趟旅行，並且需要申請飛行常客計劃或把飛行哩程添加到一個我已經參加了的計劃中，AwardWallet 能夠提供幫助嗎？

trans-unit.source: I have a question about my AwardWallet profile, what is your technical support phone number?
trans-unit.target: 我有關於我的 AwardWallet 檔案的疑問，請問您的技術支援電話號碼？

trans-unit.source: I cannot check my current balance on an award program because I do not know my username or password, can AwardWallet help?
trans-unit.target: 我無法查看一個獎勵計劃的餘額，因為我不知道我的用戶名稱或密碼，AwardWallet 能夠提供幫助嗎？

trans-unit.source: I added an award program to my profile and checking the balance returns an error. What am I doing wrong?
trans-unit.target: 我在我的個人檔案中添加了一項獎勵計劃，查看餘額時卻出現錯誤訊息。我做錯了什麼？

trans-unit.source:
If the airline in question is part of an alliance it will have an alliance icon next to it. Click the icon to see all airlines that are part of that alliance. For more details see this tip:

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/2-airline-alliance-popup/
trans-unit.target:
If the airline in question is part of an alliance it will have an alliance icon next to it. Click the icon to see all airlines that are part of that alliance. For more details see this tip:

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/2-airline-alliance-popup/

trans-unit.source: How do I know if the miles I have can be used to fly on another airline?
trans-unit.target: How do I know if the miles I have can be used to fly on another airline?

trans-unit.source:
If you have a large monitor, expanding the width of your browser will automatically add a "Last Updated" column to your account list. For more details check out this tip:

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/3-last-updated-column/
trans-unit.target:
If you have a large monitor, expanding the width of your browser will automatically add a "Last Updated" column to your account list. For more details check out this tip:

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/3-last-updated-column/

trans-unit.source:
First, you should update your accounts, then click the + sign next to the program and switch to the "History" tab. All the latest transaction details will show up in there. For more details check out this tip:

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/4-individual-transaction-history/
trans-unit.target:
First, you should update your accounts, then click the + sign next to the program and switch to the "History" tab. All the latest transaction details will show up in there. For more details check out this tip:

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/4-individual-transaction-history/

trans-unit.source:
Yes, simply add your family members' names to your profile, and then you can assign loyalty accounts to individual family members names. For more details check out this tip:

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/8-track-accounts-for-family/
trans-unit.target:
Yes, simply add your family members' names to your profile, and then you can assign loyalty accounts to individual family members names. For more details check out this tip:

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/8-track-accounts-for-family/

trans-unit.source:
Yes, you can (and should) backup your passwords if you decided to store them locally. You can do that by selecting the accounts you wish to backup and then choose the "Backup Passwords" option from the "Actions" menu.  For more details please check out this tip:

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/9-backup-your-passwords/
trans-unit.target:
Yes, you can (and should) backup your passwords if you decided to store them locally. You can do that by selecting the accounts you wish to backup and then choose the "Backup Passwords" option from the "Actions" menu.  For more details please check out this tip:

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/9-backup-your-passwords/

trans-unit.source:
Yes, you can link your accounts, and then choose which accounts you wish to share with each other, and what level of access do you wish to provide. For more details please review this tip:

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/12-sharing-account-information/
trans-unit.target:

trans-unit.source:
First of all, thank you! Second, yes we have an affiliate program, and all of our logos and screenshots and banners are always neatly organized on this page which BTW, can always be accessed if you just right-click (option-click) on our logo at the top of any page. For more details please review this tip:

https://awardwallet.com/blog/tip_of_the_day/27-logos-and-banners/

trans-unit.source: To delete one of the loyalty accounts from your AwardWallet profile you simply need to first select that account by clicking a checkbox next to it and then you will see a button with a trash bin in the menu, which, when clicked, will delete all accounts that are selected.
trans-unit.target: To delete one of the loyalty accounts from your AwardWallet profile you simply need to first select that account by clicking a checkbox next to it and then you will see a button with a trash bin in the menu, which, when clicked, will delete all accounts that are selected.

trans-unit.source: First, please double-check that you are entering the correct code. If you are 100% sure the code is correct then it could be a time sync issue. If the time on your laptop is 1:00 pm and the time on your phone where you are generating the code is 1:03 pm, that would indicate a problem. In that case, you should get your phone clock synced and then try again.
trans-unit.target: First, please double-check that you are entering the correct code. If you are 100% sure the code is correct then it could be a time sync issue. If the time on your laptop is 1:00 pm and the time on your phone where you are generating the code is 1:03 pm, that would indicate a problem. In that case, you should get your phone clock synced and then try again.

trans-unit.source:
Balance Watch monitors a loyalty account to alert you as soon as your balance changes. Points from American Express, Chase, Citi, Marriott, and Capital One don't always post instantly when you transfer them to partner loyalty programs. 

When you find award availability for a flight or hotel, transfer your points and then use this service to make sure you can confirm your reservation before the availability disappears. Once activated, AwardWallet will check your account frequently and send you a desktop, mobile, and email notification as soon as a change is detected. 

Here is a quick explainer video recorded by our friends from TripAstute:
What are Balance Watch credits?
trans-unit.target: What are Balance Watch credits?

trans-unit.source:
The AwardWallet Merchant Lookup Tool allows users to search for merchants and identify how transactions with those merchants are coded for a credit card transaction. This is important to maximize earning the most amount of points you can with a specific credit card.

Some of the most common bonus categories for credit card spend are grocery, gas, travel, and dining. However, not all merchant types are as easy to classify. To find out, simply search for the store in question in the Merchant Lookup Tool and it will display a list of confirmed credit cards that earn more than 1 point per dollar at that particular merchant.

Here is a quick explainer video:
trans-unit.target:

Some of the most common bonus categories for credit card spend are grocery, gas, travel, and dining. However, not all merchant types are as easy to classify. To find out, simply search for the store in question in the Merchant Lookup Tool and it will display a list of confirmed credit cards that earn more than 1 point per dollar at that particular merchant.

trans-unit.source: AwardWallet only uses your Gmail data to retrieve travel reservations and loyalty account statements for the purposes of making the AwardWallet's service work. AwardWallet's use of information received, and AwardWallet's transfer of information to any other app, from Google APIs will adhere to Google's Limited Use Requirements. In addition to that none of your personal data that you have stored in AwardWallet is ever transmitted to any third party without your prior explicit written consent.
trans-unit.target: AwardWallet only uses your Gmail data to retrieve travel reservations and loyalty account statements for the purposes of making the AwardWallet's service work. AwardWallet's use of information received, and AwardWallet's transfer of information to any other app, from Google APIs will adhere to Google's Limited Use Requirements. In addition to that none of your personal data that you have stored in AwardWallet is ever transmitted to any third party without your prior explicit written consent.
